constellations_other.name: Processing grief through art
constellations_other.description: Thor: Love and Thunder begins with Thor meditating in a robe designed by Gumbaynggirr/Bundjalung artist Otis Hope Carey, best known for Ngalunggirr miinggi (healing spirit) (2020), a painting that expresses his grief over the loss of grandmother. Many artists process grief through their creative work.

results.title: The Fundamentals of tennis
results.brief_description: Donald Budge demonstrates forehand, backhand, service, volley and half-volley; the strokes are analysed and helpful suggestions for their proper execution are made. The film was sponsored by the USA Lawn Tennis Association.
results.description: Donald Budge demonstrates forehand, backhand, service, volley and half-volley; the strokes are analysed and helpful suggestions for their proper execution are made. The film was sponsored by the USA Lawn Tennis Association.

results.title: The Fundamentals of film making. No.1: learning the language
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Fundamentals of film making”.
An introduction to moving picture photography using the written word in an analogy with the completed film: how a succession of single frames, equivalent of a letter in a single word, gives an impression of continuous movement; the definition and examples of a “shot” likening it to a word in a sentence; then the “sequence” equivalent of a paragraph or chapter, depending on length. The purpose terms used and results achieved when camera angles are varied and the camera moved, and the effect of varying the time scale. How to make basic transitions (cut, fade, mix) from shot to shot.

group_siblings.title: The Fundamentals of film making - No.2: using the camera

results.title: The Fundamentals of film making - No.2: using the camera
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Fundamentals of film making”.
An introduction to moving picture camera use; loading, running off leader and how to avoid fogging; how to keep the camera steady and use of a tripod; panning and common faults to avoid; the use of the zoom and the need for restraint; placing of the camera and avoidance of the jump cut; pitfalls of reverse action and parallax.

results.title: The Frozen flame
results.brief_description: When natural gas is cooled to minus 161 degrees centigrade it becomes a liquid: liquified natural gas, or LNG. In 1959, Shell participated in the first ocean crossing of a cargo of LNG, marking the genesis of the modern LNG industry. In this video, projects in Brunei, Japan, Malaysia and Australia illustrate Shell’s history in the LNG business across management, finance, shipping and supply.

results.title: The Frog princess
results.creator_credit: Paul N Peroff and Coronet Instructional Films
results.brief_description: An animated film which tells the story of a prince in search of a bride. He shoots an arrow into the air with the intention of marrying whoever finds it. But it is found by a frog, who is really an enchanted princess. Together they have many adventures until she is released from the spell.

results.title: The Frog prince
results.brief_description: This is one of the beautifully made Lotte reiniger silhouette puppet films of the traditional fairy story. To decide which of his daughters should marry next, the king tosses each of them a golden ball, which the youngest one catches. She accidentally drops it down a well and it is recovered by a frog who is later transformed into a handsome man.

results.title: The Frog's world
results.brief_description: Life cycle and habits of the different species of frogs and toads which live in the Japanese rice fields; how to catch them and care for them in an aquarium. The large number of eggs and tadpoles appearing each year is soon reduced by predators such as the newt, drgaon fly larvae and the water mantis. Titles and credits in Japanese. English commentary.
